title: DAY 2 (Bonus) TODAY takes you to the Winter Olympics
description: Listen to a special Winter Olympics episode of the TODAY podcast. Hear all the history-making moments, athlete interviews, and inspiring stories every morning on the TODAY podcast — your daily destination for news on the go. Follow and listen to TODAY now: https://link.chtbl.com/olympics_today
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Sports)
